title: South America the series. -Volume 2
creator_credit: Phoenix Films, BFA Films and Video and Wayne Mitchell
brief_description: Part two of a series of five on South America travels to the Caribbean Coast visiting five countries from the northern region; Venezuela, Colombia, Guyana, Surinam and French Guiana. These countries possess a diversity in people and landscape but share the same warm tropical equator weather.
